H0.text: Elements are the mixture of things that make up matter.

H1.text: Segments are the things that make up matter, which is a mixture of things.

H2.text: Compounds are the mixture of things that make up matter.

H3.text: Structures are the mixture of things that matter is made up of.

A4.text: The term 'chemical element' meant a substance that cannot be broken down into constituent substances by chemical reactions.

A5.text: Chemical compounds are substances made of atoms of different elements; they can have molecular or non-molecular structure.
